mutants.code:
def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    s1 = ''.join(sorted(s1))
    s2 = ''.join(sorted(s2))
    return s1 != s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    s1 = 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(s1))
    s2 = ''.join(sorted(s2))
    return s1 == s2

def is_anagram(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((c for c in s1 if c.isalpha()))
    s2 = ''.join((c for c in s2 if c.isalpha()))
    s1 = ''.join(sorted(s1))
    s2 = 'MUTATED'.join(sorted(s2))
    return s1 == s2
